greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-2*x+2*x^2)/((1+x)*(1-x)^3).
comment: Partial sums of A097065. Pairwise sums are A000124, with extra leading 1.
Binomial transform is 1, 1, 3, 9, 26, ..., A072863 with extra leading 1.
link: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,0,-2,1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(1-2x+2x^2)/((1+x)(1-x)^3), {x, 0, 70}], x] (* or *) LinearRecurrence[{2, 0, -2, 1}, {1, 0, 2, 2}, 70] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, Apr 08 2014 *)
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Jul 22 2004
